alert.note: Alert for Western Passaic (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 9:15PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...SPOTTY LIGHT FREEZING RAIN POTENTIAL FOR ORANGE COUNTY NY AND WESTERN PASSAIC COUNTY NJ... Some spotty light freezing rain will be possible across parts of Orange County NY and Western Passaic County NJ for the remainder of this evening and into the start of the overnight period. Temperatures in some parts of Orange County and Western Passaic County will be at or slightly below freezing, allowing for any light rain that falls to freeze upon impact. Any untreated surfaces will have some patchy ice as a result, making for slippery conditions. Motorists should proceed with caution in these areas tonight as there could be patchy ice on untreated roads. Drive extra slowly and allow for extra space between vehicles.
